member.summary: Protocol version used by the server.

member.summary: Number of bots on the server.

member.summary: Indicates the operating system of the server.(Linux/Windows/Mac)

member.summary: Indicates whether the server requires a password

member.summary: Specifies whether the server uses VAC.

member.summary: Version of the game installed on the server.

member.remarks: Present only in Obsolete server responses.

member.summary: Indicates whether mod uses its own DLL

member.summary: Servers running the specified modification(ex. cstrike)

member.summary: Servers running on a Linux platform

member.summary: Servers with all of the given tag(s) in sv_tags

member.summary: Servers with all of the given tag(s) in their 'hidden' tags (L4D2)

member.returns: Instance of server class that represents the connected server.
